member.name: T:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter
member.summary: A bitstream filter operates on the encoded stream data, and performs bitstream level modifications without performing decoding. https://www.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-bitstream-filters.html

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.aac_adtstoasc
member.summary: Convert MPEG-2/4 AAC ADTS to an MPEG-4 Audio Specific Configuration bitstream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.av1_metadata
member.summary: Modify metadata embedded in an AV1 stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.chomp
member.summary: Remove zero padding at the end of a packet.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.dca_core
member.summary: Extract the core from a DCA/DTS stream, dropping extensions such as DTS-HD.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.dump_extra
member.summary: Add extradata to the beginning of the filtered packets except when said packets already exactly begin with the extradata that is intended to be added.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.eac3_core
member.summary: Extract the core from a E-AC-3 stream, dropping extra channels.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.filter_units
member.summary: Remove units with types in or not in a given set from the stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.hapqa_extract
member.summary: Extract Rgb or Alpha part of an HAPQA file, without recompression, in order to create an HAPQ or an HAPAlphaOnly file.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.h264_metadata
member.summary: Modify metadata embedded in an H.264 stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.h264_mp4toannexb
member.summary: Convert an H.264 bitstream from length prefixed mode to start code prefixed mode (as defined in the Annex B of the ITU-T H.264 specification).

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.h264_redundant_pps
member.summary: This applies a specific fixup to some Blu-ray streams which contain redundant PPSs modifying irrelevant parameters of the stream which confuse other transformations which require correct extradata.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.hevc_metadata
member.summary: Modify metadata embedded in an HEVC stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.hevc_mp4toannexb
member.summary: Convert an HEVC/H.265 bitstream from length prefixed mode to start code prefixed mode (as defined in the Annex B of the ITU-T H.265 specification).

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.imxdump
member.summary: Modifies the bitstream to fit in MOV and to be usable by the Final Cut Pro decoder. This filter only applies to the mpeg2video codec, and is likely not needed for Final Cut Pro 7 and newer with the appropriate -tag:v.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.mjpeg2jpeg
member.summary: Convert MJPEG/AVI1 packets to full JPEG/JFIF packets.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.mjpegadump
member.summary: Add an MJPEG A header to the bitstream, to enable decoding by Quicktime.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.mov2textsub
member.summary: Extract a representable text file from MOV subtitles, stripping the metadata header from each subtitle packet.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.mp3decomp
member.summary: Decompress non-standard compressed MP3 audio headers.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.mpeg2_metadata
member.summary: Modify metadata embedded in an MPEG-2 stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.noise
member.summary: Damages the contents of packets or simply drops them without damaging the container. Can be used for fuzzing or testing error resilience/concealment.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.prores_metadata
member.summary: Modify color property metadata embedded in prores stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.text2movsub
member.summary: Convert text subtitles to MOV subtitles (as used by the mov_text codec) with metadata headers.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.trace_headers
member.summary: Log trace output containing all syntax elements in the coded stream headers (everything above the level of individual coded blocks). This can be useful for debugging low-level stream issues.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.truehd_core
member.summary: Extract the core from a TrueHD stream, dropping ATMOS data.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.vp9_metadata
member.summary: Modify metadata embedded in a VP9 stream.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.vp9_superframe
member.summary: Merge VP9 invisible (alt-ref) frames back into VP9 superframes. This fixes merging of split/segmented VP9 streams where the alt-ref frame was split from its visible counterpart.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.vp9_superframe_split
member.summary: Split VP9 superframes into single frames.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.BitstreamFilter.vp9_raw_reorder
member.summary: Given a VP9 stream with correct timestamps but possibly out of order, insert additional show-existing-frame packets to correct the ordering.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.mv4
member.summary: Use four motion vector by macroblock (mpeg4).

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.pass1
member.summary: Use internal 2pass ratecontrol in first pass mode.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.pass2
member.summary: Use internal 2pass ratecontrol in second pass mode.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.truncated
member.summary: Input bitstream might be randomly truncated.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.drop_changed
member.summary: Dont output frames whose parameters differ from first decoded frame in stream. Error AVERROR_INPUT_CHANGED is returned when a frame is dropped.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.global_header
member.summary: Place global headers in extradata instead of every keyframe.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.bitexact
member.summary: Only write platform-, build- and time-independent data. (except (I)DCT). This ensures that file and data checksums are reproducible and match between platforms. Its primary use is for regression testing.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.aic
member.summary: Apply H263 advanced intra coding / mpeg4 ac prediction.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.cbp
member.summary: Deprecated, use mpegvideo private options instead.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.Flag.qprd
member.summary: Deprecated, use mpegvideo private options instead.

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.ChangeSpeed(System.Double)
member.param: Speed value. (0.5 - 2.0). To double the speed set this to 2.0

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.SetFramerate(System.Double)
member.summary: Set Framerate of the video (-r option)

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.SetBitrate(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Set Bitrate of the video (-b:v option)

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.SetBitrate(System.Int64)
member.summary: Set Bitrate of the video (-b:v option)

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.CopyStream
member.summary: Set stream to copy with orginal codec

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.SetSeek(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Seeks in input file to position. (-ss argument)

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.AddSubtitles(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Path to subtitle file in .srt format
Set subtitles input character encoding. Only useful if not UTF-8.
Override default style or script info parameters of the subtitles. It accepts a string containing ASS style format KEY=VALUE couples separated by ","

member.name: M:Xabe.FFmpeg.IVideoStream.AddSubtitles(System.String,Xabe.FFmpeg.VideoSize,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Path to subtitle file in .srt format
Set subtitles input character encoding. Only useful if not UTF-8.
Override default style or script info parameters of the subtitles. It accepts a string containing ASS style format KEY=VALUE couples separated by ","
Specify the size of the original video, the video for which the ASS style was composed. This is necessary to correctly scale the fonts if the aspect ratio has been changed.

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.RotateDegrees.CounterClockwiseAndFlip
member.summary: 90 degrees counter clockwise and vertical flip

member.name: F:Xabe.FFmpeg.RotateDegrees.ClockwiseAndFlip
member.summary: 90 degrees counter clockwise and vertical flip
